attributes.action: Issue quick human protection visa to Syrian families affected by earthquake
attributes.additional_details: Our hearts bleeding sadness every single day when we see the kids suffering from the hunger and the freezing weather that passes in Turkey and north Syria. The kids and their families there experience a life unworthy of humanity, please protect their humanity.
attributes.background: The Syrian people are struggling since 12 years from the dictatorship regime most of them are refugees in turkey so the devastating earthquake increased their suffering and grief. It made them homeless, injured and in need. So please help them to get better life in UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632816
